name: rolling-kick
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The user cuts a quick spin and lashes out with a sharp kick.
flavor_text.platinum: The user cuts a quick spin and lashes out with a sharp kick.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: The user lashes out with a quick, spinning kick. It may also make the target flinch.
